trend: You are forecasting the long-term trend of ratio of patients with influenza illness in a healthcare / epidemiology dataset called ILI dataset, sampled every weekly over 2002-2021. Focus on modeling smooth and gradual structural changes over time.
seasonal: You are forecasting the yearly seasonal variation of ratio of patients with influenza illness in the healthcare / epidemiology dataset ILI dataset, sampled every weekly. Focus on modeling repeating cycles or periodic patterns in the data.
residual: You are estimating short-term irregular fluctuations in ratio of patients with influenza illness in the dataset ILI dataset after removing trend and yearly seasonality. The data is sampled at weekly and spans 2002-2021. Focus on modeling noise and unexpected spikes.
